names.english: mulberry leaf and moutan decoction to drain the white
names.commonEnglish: Mulberry Leaf and Moutan Decoction to Drain the White

actions: Drains Heat from the Lungs, stops cough and calms wheezing.
With Di Gu Pi and Gan Cao, for cough with thick sputum, fever, irritability, and thirst due to Phlegm-Heat Obstructing the Lungs.
Calms the Liver, clears Heat from the Lungs, stops cough, moistens Dryness, cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
Clears Heat, cools and harmonizes the Blood and clears Liver Fire.
Clears and drains Heat in the Lung.
With Sang Bai Pi, for Lung Heat cough or wheezing.
Clears Heat, transforms Hot Phlegm, cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
Clears Heat, transforms Phlegm, stops cough and nourishes and moistens the Lungs.
Tonifies the Qi of the Lungs, Spleen and Intestines, stops restlessness, stops thirst and generates fluids.
Moistens the Lungs, resolves Phlegm, stops cough and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.

symptoms: Cough that causes pain in the chest and flanks
An inability to bend or rotate the trunk
